Package edumsg.edumsg_android_app

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ConversationFragment.OnMessageSentListener
    This interface must be implemented by activities that contain this fragment to allow an interaction in this fragment to be communicated to the activity and potentially other fragments contained in that activity.
    EditProfileFragment.OnInfoEditedListener
    This interface must be implemented by activities that contain this fragment to allow an interaction in this fragment to be communicated to the activity and potentially other fragments contained in that activity.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ActivityLauncher
    Unused class.
    AuthActivity
    Starts a LoginFragment which can use this Activity to start a RegisterFragment if needed.
    BuildConfig  
    Conversation
    ORM class for mapping between JSON and Java.
    ConversationAdapter
    Creates a View for each item in ConversationFragment.conversationRV Created by omarelhagin on 2/4/16.
    ConversationAdapter.ReceivedViewHolder
    Custom ViewHolder implementation of RecyclerView.ViewHolder to represent the view for received messages.
    ConversationAdapter.SentViewHolder
    Custom ViewHolder implementation of RecyclerView.ViewHolder to represent the view for sent messages.
    ConversationFragment
    A fragment that is started for each conversation in MessagesActivity.conversations.
    DirectMessage
    ORM class for mapping between JSON and Java.
    EditProfileFragment
    A fragment that provides the user with many views that allow the user to edit their info.
    FollowersAdapter
    Used to populate the AutoCompleteTextView in MessagesActivity's send message dialog.
    List
    ORM class for mapping between JSON and Java.
    ListActivity
    Displays a timeline of a list which contains all tweets and retweets created by this list's members.
    ListsActivity
    Shows all lists that the logged in user is subscribed to.
    ListsAdapter
    Creates a View for each item in ListsActivity.listsRecyclerView.
    ListsAdapter.ListItemViewHolder
    Custom ViewHolder implementation of RecyclerView.ViewHolder to represent the view for each list item.
    LoginFragment
    Allows the user to log in using a username and password.
    MainActivity
    Provides the home page for a user, which contains a news feed of tweets and an action bar.
    MainActivityFragment
    Used to show all replies to a tweet.
    MessagesActivity
    Displays all conversations for the logged in user, showing the last message sent or received in each one.
    MessagesAdapter
    Creates a View for each item in MessagesActivity.recyclerView Created by Omar on 22/2/2016.
    MyAppCompatActivity
    Base class for all activities that contains all variables that need to be shared throughout the application, and the main Volley request queue.
    NavigationFragment
    Fragment that contains buttons that allow navigation to different parts of the application.
    ProfileActivity
    Contains a user's image, bio, and timeline.
    R  
    R.anim  
    R.attr  
    R.bool  
    R.color  
    R.dimen  
    R.drawable  
    R.id  
    R.integer  
    R.layout  
    R.menu  
    R.mipmap  
    R.string  
    R.style  
    R.styleable  
    R.xml  
    RegisterFragment
    Allows the user to register using a username, password, email, and name.
    RVAdapter
    Creates a View for each item in MainActivity.recyclerView.
    SearchResultsActivity
    Started from MainActivity to display search results when a user uses the SearchView in MainActivity's action bar.
    SearchResultsAdapter
    Creates a View for each item in SearchResultsActivity.searchRV.
    Tweet
    ORM class for mapping between JSON and Java.
    User
    ORM class for mapping between JSON and Java.
